name: unforeseeable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An unforeseeable event or situation is one that cannot be known about or guessed before it happens: Loss due to unforeseeable circumstances is borne by the purchaser. These countries were facing a very grave crisis with unforeseeable consequences.
More examplesFewer examplesThe district had argued that the game was safe and well supervised, and that the accident was unforeseeable. They argued that the doctor's mistakes did not necessarily cause the death. Rather, unforeseeable drug interactions were more likely to blame.The consequences were by no means unforeseeable.
